name: A ReTail Experience
description:
Experience a day in the life of a ReTail employee. Be quick on your feet and help customers with their problems! Be efficient or else you will not be working another!

KEY FEATURES:

- Help customers on the self-checkout machines (SCO) by playing one of 5 mini-games

- Watch the clock to be able to send your co workers on their breaks on time

- Some days are busier than others. Choose which of three shifts you want to pick up and be ready for what's to come!
